name: Snickerdoodle Cookies
author: Donna Menz, S.M.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°. Sift together flour, cream of tarter, baking soda and salt, set aside. In large bowl, with electric mixer on medium, beat shortening until creamy. Gradually beat in the 1 1⁄2 cups of sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Gradually beat in flour mixture. In small bowl, combine the remaining 1/4 cup sugar and cin- namon. Roll dough into 1 inch balls. Roll balls in sugar-cinnamon mixture. Place on ungreased baking sheet about 2 inches apart. Bake 12 to 15 minutes. Cool completely on wire rack. Makes about 3 1⁄2 dozen cookies.
